argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lcdvs0.h | |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) |
| 2 |  | lcdvs0.u | |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) |
| 3 |  | lcdvs0.s | |- S = ( Scalar ` U ) |
| 4 |  | lcdvs0.r | |- R = ( Base ` S ) |
| 5 |  | lcdvs0.c | |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) |
| 6 |  | lcdvs0.t | |- .x. = ( .s ` C ) |
| 7 |  | lcdvs0.o | |- .0. = ( 0g ` C ) |
| 8 |  | lcdvs0.k | |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) |
| 9 |  | lcdvs0.x | |- ( ph -> X e. R ) |
| 10 | 1, 5, 8 | #P_lcdlmod | |- ( ph -> C e. LMod ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Scalar ` C ) = ( Scalar ` C ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( Scalar ` C ) ) = ( Base ` ( Scalar ` C ) ) |
| 13 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 11, 12, 8 | #P_lcdsbase | |- ( ph -> ( Base ` ( Scalar ` C ) ) = R ) |
| 14 | 9, 13 | #P_eleqtrrd | |- ( ph -> X e. ( Base ` ( Scalar ` C ) ) ) |
| 15 | 11, 6, 12, 7 | #P_lmodvs0 | |- ( ( C e. LMod /\ X e. ( Base ` ( Scalar ` C ) ) ) -> ( X .x. .0. ) = .0. ) |
| 16 | 10, 14, 15 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( X .x. .0. ) = .0. ) |
